Navigation

Inboxes

Show Inbox Agent Bot

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

inboxes

/

{id}

/

agent\_bot

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/inboxes/{id}/agent_bot \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

204

403

404

Copy

```
{
  "id": 123,
  "name": "<string>",
  "description": "<string>",
  "thumbnail": "<string>",
  "outgoing_url": "<string>",
  "bot_type": "<string>",
  "bot_config": {},
  "account_id": 123,
  "access_token": "<string>",
  "system_bot": true
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#parameter-id)

id

number

required

ID of the inbox

#### Response

204

204403404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-id)

id

number

ID of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-name)

name

string

The name of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-description)

description

string

The description about the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-thumbnail)

thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-outgoing-url)

outgoing\_url

string

The webhook URL for the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-bot-type)

bot\_type

string

The type of the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-bot-config)

bot\_config

object

The configuration of the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-account-id)

account\_id

number

Account ID if it's an account specific bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-access-token)

access\_token

string

The access token for the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/show-inbox-agent-bot#response-system-bot)

system\_bot

boolean

Whether the bot is a system bot

[Previous](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/update-inbox) [Add or remove agent botTo add an agent bot pass agent\_bot id, to remove agent bot from an inbox pass null\\
